definition: Magnetic measurements derived from GRACE-FO platform magnetometers
description: This product contains calibrated magnetic measurements derived from GRACE-FO platform magnetometers
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,ms,Timestamp,1,CDF_EPOCH
Latitude,-,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude,-,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius,-,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
B_FGM,nT,"[nT] Fluxgate magnetometer, FGM, aligned, vector-vector calibrated and corrected for satellite disturbances, FGM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_NEC,nT,"[nT] Fluxgate magnetometer, FGM, aligned, vector-vector calibrated and corrected for satellite disturbances, NEC frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
q_NEC_FGM, ,"Quaternion, transformation: NEC ... FGM",4,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_MTQ_FGM,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to magnetorquer, FGM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_XI_FGM,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to 2nd order non-linearities, FGM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_NY_FGM,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to 3rd order non-linearities, FGM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_BT_FGM,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to temperature dependency of offsets, FGM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_ST_FGM,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to temperature dependency of scale factors, FGM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_SA_FGM,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to solar array currents, FGM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
dB_BAT_FGM,nT,"[nT] Disturbance field related to battery currents, FGM frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_FLAG,-,-,1,CDF_UINT1
LABELS_B,-,LABELS_B,3,CDF_CHAR
LABELS_BNEC,-,LABELS_BNEC,3,CDF_CHAR
LABELS_Q,-,LABELS_Q,4,CDF_CHAR
related_resources:
• Stolle, C., Michaelis, I., Xiong, C. et al., Observing Earth’s magnetic environment with the GRACE-FO mission. Earth Planets Space 73, 51 (2021).
    https://doi.org/10.1186/s40623-021-01364-w
